content:
I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed the peanut sauce with the muffin tin noodle cups! Here are some recipe suggestions that would pair well with peanut sauce:

1. Stir-fry: Make a stir-fry with your favorite vegetables and protein (such as chicken, beef, or tofu) and drizzle peanut sauce over the top before serving.
2. Noodle salad: Combine cooked noodles with sliced vegetables (such as carrots, bell peppers, and cucumbers) and drizzle peanut sauce over the top for a refreshing and flavorful salad.
3. Spring rolls: Fill rice paper wrappers with sliced vegetables and cooked shrimp or chicken, and dip in peanut sauce for a delicious appetizer or light meal.
4. Grilled chicken: Marinate chicken breasts in a mixture of peanut sauce, soy sauce, and garlic, then grill until cooked through and serve with additional peanut sauce for dipping.
5. Buddha bowls: Build a bowl with a base of brown rice or quinoa, topped with roasted vegetables, sliced avocado, and tofu or chicken. Drizzle peanut sauce over the top for a flavor-packed meal.

I hope these recipe suggestions inspire you to try peanut sauce in different ways!
